comment.text: 3'-5' DNA helicase involved in repair of alkylated DNA. Promotes DNA unwinding to generate single-stranded substrate needed for ALKBH3, enabling ALKBH3 to process alkylated N3-methylcytosine (3mC) within double-stranded regions. Enhances NF-kappa-B, SRF and AP1 transactivation.
Part of the ASC-1/TRIP4 complex, that contains TRIP4, ASCC1, ASCC2 and ASCC3. The ASC-1 complex interacts with ALKBH3.

property.value: ALKBH3 mediated reversal of alkylation damage
P:DNA dealkylation involved in DNA repair

feature.description: Abolishes 3'-5' DNA helicase activity and ability to promote DNA repair.
